params.name: PathOffset
params.title: 차선치우침 좌우보정(0)
params.edescr: (-)Left,(+)Right

params.name: StopDistance
params.title: 정지거리(600cm)
params.edescr: Adjust stop distance

params.name: TrafficStopDistanceAdjust
params.title: 신호정지 위치조정(200cm)
params.edescr: +Value : forward

params.name: SteeringRateCost
params.title: SteeringRateCost(700)
params.edescr: Steering Rate Cost

params.name: LateralMotionCost
params.title: _LateralMotionCost(11)
params.edescr: Heading Follow Weight

params.name: PathCostApply
params.title: _PathCostApply(100)
params.edescr: Path Follower Carries

params.name: LateralJerkCost
params.title: _LateralJerkCost(4)
params.edescr: Lateral braking sensitivity limiting weight

params.name: LateralTorqueCustom
params.title: _LateralTorqueCustom(0)
params.edescr: 0:LiveTorque, 1:CustomTorque, 2:CustomTorque&LiveTorque

params.name: SteerActuatorDelay
params.title: SteerActuatorDelay(30)
params.edescr: If the value is large, the steering is made in advance (general, 10msec)

params.name: CruiseControlMode
params.title: 크루즈연비제어(4km/h)
params.edescr: Temporarily increase target speed

params.name: CruiseOnDist
params.title: 크루즈ON거리(0cm)
params.edescr: When the accelerator/brake is OFF, cruise ON when the vehicle in front approaches the set distance

params.name: SteerRatioApply
params.title: SteerRatio적용(0x0.1)
params.edescr: 0: Use LiveSteerRatio, unit: 0.1

params.name: SteerRatioAccelApply
params.title: SteerRatioAccel적용(0%)
params.edescr: I think I should test it with the Accel term application test (+) value in SR.

params.name: MyEcoModeFactor
params.title: 연비가속비율(80%)
params.edescr: Specifies the acceleration rate compared to normal mode.

params.name: CruiseMaxVals1
params.title: 가속설정1:0km/h(160)
params.edescr: Set the acceleration. (x0.01m/s^2)

params.name: CruiseMaxVals2
params.title: 가속설정2:40km/h(120)
params.edescr: Set the acceleration. (x0.01m/s^2)

params.name: CruiseMaxVals3
params.title: 가속설정3:60km/h(100)
params.edescr: Set the acceleration. (x0.01m/s^2)

params.name: CruiseMaxVals4
params.title: 가속설정4:80km/h(80)
params.edescr: Set the acceleration. (x0.01m/s^2)

params.name: CruiseMaxVals5
params.title: 가속설정5:110km/h(70)
params.edescr: Set the acceleration. (x0.01m/s^2)

params.name: CruiseMaxVals6
params.title: 가속설정6:140km/h(60)
params.edescr: Set the acceleration. (x0.01m/s^2)

params.name: MySafeModeFactor
params.title: 안전비율(80%)
params.descr: 가속도, 정지거리, 감속율, 차간거리를 평소보다 안전하게 유지합니다.
params.edescr: Acceleration, stopping distance, deceleration rate, and following distance are kept safer than usual.

params.name: JerkUpperLowerLimit
params.title: JERK값 (8)
params.edescr: The higher the value, the faster the acceleration/deceleration response.

params.name: LongitudinalTuningKpV
params.title: KpV게인(100)
params.edescr: Scheduled to be deleted: For long control control

params.name: LongitudinalActuatorDelayLowerBound
params.title: _LADLowerBound(30)
params.edescr: Lowering it increases stopping power and reduces acceleration.

params.name: LongitudinalActuatorDelayUpperBound
params.title: _LADUpperBound(60)
params.edescr: Raise it to increase deceleration

params.name: LongitudinalTuningKiV
params.title: KiV게인(200)
params.edescr: Scheduled to be deleted: Reflected only during stop (for testing)

params.name: LongitudinalTuningKf
params.title: Kf게인(100)
params.edescr: Feed Forward Gain

params.name: AChangeCost
params.title: A_CHANGE_COST(200)
params.edescr: If it is small, the response to the vehicle in front is quicker.

params.name: TrafficStopAccel
params.title: 신호정지 감속율 (80%)
params.edescr: When it encounters a signal, it gradually decelerates and stops.

params.name: TrafficStopMode
params.title: 신호정지 방법 (1)
params.edescr: 0: Not used, 1: Used

params.name: ApplyModelDistOrder
params.title: 신호정지 감속모델선택 (32)
params.edescr: The lower the number, the slower the speed.

params.name: TrafficStopAdjustRatio
params.title: 신호정지선 보정비율 (90%)
params.descr: 급한신호정지를 막기위해 미리 속도를 줄일수 있는...
params.edescr: You can slow down in advance to avoid a sudden traffic light stop.

params.name: AutoCurveSpeedFactor
params.title: 커브속도조절비율(100%)
params.edescr: Higher will slow down the curve.

params.name: AutoCurveSpeedFactorIn
params.title: 커브속도조절비율진입(10%)
params.edescr: If you increase it, it will try to reduce the entry speed more.

params.name: AutoTurnControl
params.title: NOO Helper(0)
params.edescr: 0: Not used, 1: TMAP/Mappy Helper, 2: Test

params.name: AutoLaneChangeSpeed
params.title: 자동차선변경속도(30)
params.edescr: Car line change only at the specified speed or higher

params.name: CruiseButtonMode
params.title: 크루즈버튼작동모드(0)
params.edescr: 0:general,1:user1,2:user2,3:user3,4:user4

params.name: GapButtonMode
params.title: 크루즈갭버튼 작동모드(0)
params.edescr: 0:1~4, 1:1~5, 2:4~5, 3:4~5 (Cruise OFF mode) (4:Auto, 5:Cruise ON limit mode)

params.name: PrevCruiseGap
params.title: 크루즈갭: 초기값(4)
params.edescr: Specify the initial value of the cruise gap button

params.name: CruiseSpeedMin
params.title: 크루즈 최저속도(10)
params.edescr: Minimum cruise control speed

params.name: AutoResumeFromGasSpeedMode
params.title: 엑셀크루즈ON:복원속도
params.edescr: 0: current speed, 1: previous speed, 2: preceding vehicle, 3: straight ahead over 60M

params.name: AutoCancelFromGasMode
params.title: 엑셀 크루즈OFF:모드
params.descr: 엑셀크루즈ON속도 이하에서 엑셀을 밟으면 크루즈가 해제 1:항상, 2:레이더OFF시에만
params.edescr: Accel Cruise ON Cruise is canceled when the accelerator is pressed below the speed 1: Always, 2: Only when the radar is OFF

params.name: AutoResumeFromBrakeReleaseDist
params.title: 브레이크해제 크루즈ON:주행,선행차
params.etitle: Brake release cruise ON: driving, preceding vehicle
params.edescr: If the preceding vehicle is more than a certain distance, cruise is turned on.

params.name: AutoResumeFromBrakeReleaseLeadCar
params.title: 브레이크해제 크루즈ON:정지,선행차
params.etitle: Brake release cruise ON: stop, preceding vehicle
params.edescr: When you stop behind the preceding vehicle and release the brake (the preceding vehicle within 10m)

params.name: AutoResumeFromBrakeCarSpeed
params.title: 브레이크해제 크루즈ON:주행,속도
params.etitle: Brake release cruise ON: driving, speed
params.edescr: Reduce speed while driving fast. Operates when the speed is higher than the set speed (no preceding car)

params.name: AutoResumeFromBrakeReleaseTrafficSign
params.title: 브레이크해제 크루즈ON:주행,신호
params.etitle: Brake release Cruise ON: driving, signal
params.edescr: Red signal during fast driving, reduce speed and operate below 70Km/h

params.name: AutoSyncCruiseSpeedMax
params.title: 자동속도업데이트속도 (120)
params.descr: 가속시 크루즈속도보다 높아지면 지정 속도를 올려줍니다.
params.edescr: When accelerating, if it exceeds the cruise speed, the designated speed is raised.

params.name: AutoSpeedUptoRoadSpeedLimit
params.title: 자동속도증가모드 (100)
params.edescr: Automatic speed up to the road speed according to the vehicle in front.

params.name: ShowHudMode
params.title: HUD표시모드
params.edescr: 0: Normal, 1: APilot, 2: Fixed bottom, 3: Fixed top, 4: Fixed left, 5: Fixed bottom left

params.name: ShowAccelRpm
params.title: 가속도표시
params.edescr: 0: No display, 1: Acceleration, 2: Acceleration + RPM

params.name: ShowSteerMode
params.title: 핸들표시모드
params.edescr: 0: Black wheel, 1: Color wheel, 2: No wheel

params.name: ShowConnInfo
params.title: 부가정보
params.edescr: NDA,SCC2,RadarTracks Information

params.name: ShowLaneInfo
params.title: 차선정보
params.edescr: -1: none, 0: pass only, 1: lane, 2: road edge

params.name: ShowBlindSpot
params.title: BSD정보(1)
params.edescr: 0: None, 1: Show BSD information

params.name: ShowGapInfo
params.title: GAP정보(0)
params.edescr: -1: no display, 0: gap, driving mode, 1: graph

params.name: ShowDmInfo
params.title: DM정보(1)
params.edescr: 0: don't use, 1: use, -1: MODEL not use (restart)

params.name: ShowRadarInfo
params.title: 레이더감지정보(0)
params.edescr: 0: No, 1: Display, 2: Relative position, 3: Stop vehicle

params.name: ShowZOffset
params.title: 패스높이(170)
params.edescr: Raise the path until the end of the path is marked under the car in front

params.name: ShowPathMode
params.title: 패스종류,레인리스(9)
params.edescr: 0:Normal,1,2:Square,3,4:^^,5,6:Square,7,8:^^,9,10,11:smooth^^,12:smooth2^^,13:3 lines ,14:2 lines,15:1 lines

params.name: ShowPathColor
params.title: 패스색상,레인리스(12)
params.edescr: (+10: Belt) 0: Red, 1: Main, 2: Yellow, 3: Second, 4: Blue, 5: Male, 6: Boy, 7: High, 8: White, 9: Black

params.name: ShowPathModeCruiseOff
params.title: 패스종류,크루즈OFF(9)
params.edescr: 0:Normal,1,2:Square,3,4:^^,5,6:Square,7,8:^^,9,10,11:smooth^^,12:smooth2^^,13:3 lines ,14:2 lines,15:1 lines

params.name: ShowPathColorCruiseOff
params.title: 패스색상,크루즈OFF(1)
params.edescr: (+10: Belt) 0: Red, 1: Main, 2: Yellow, 3: Second, 4: Blue, 5: Male, 6: Boy, 7: High, 8: White, 9: Black

params.name: ShowPathModeLane
params.title: 패스종류,레인모드(11)
params.edescr: 0:Normal,1,2:Square,3,4:^^,5,6:Square,7,8:^^,9,10,11:smooth^^,12:smooth2^^,13:3 lines ,14:2 lines,15:1 lines

params.name: ShowPathColorLane
params.title: 패스색상,레인모드(3)
params.edescr: (+10: Belt) 0: Red, 1: Main, 2: Yellow, 3: Second, 4: Blue, 5: Male, 6: Boy, 7: High, 8: White, 9: Black

params.name: ShowPlotMode
params.title: 디버그플롯(0)
params.edescr: 1: acceleration, 2: acceleration (average), 3: steering acceleration, 4: speed, 5: model x

params.name: EnableAutoEngage
params.title: 자동인게이지 사용(0)
params.edescr: 0: Disable, 1: Use, 2: Cruise ON

params.name: UseLaneLineSpeed
params.title: 레인모드작동속도(0)
params.edescr: Lane Mode Operating Speed: 0: No...

params.name: HapticFeedbackWhenSpeedCamera
params.title: 핸들햅틱기능사용(0)
params.edescr: 0: Disable, 1: Vibration, 2: Instrument panel, 3: HUD display

params.name: MaxAngleFrames
params.title: MaxAngleFrames(89)
params.edescr: 89: default

params.name: SoftHoldMode
params.title: 소프트오토홀드기능(1)
params.edescr: 0: Disable, 1: Use, 2: SCC control (X in case of error)

params.name: ExperimentalLongitudinalEnabled
params.title: 롱컨사용(0)
params.edescr: SCC wiring modification, available when using the radar track

params.name: MixRadarInfo
params.title: SCC레이더 비젼 MIX
params.descr: SCC레이더의 부족한 성능을 비젼거리측정데이터와 MIX하여 주행
params.edescr: Driving by mixing the insufficient performance of SCC radar with vision distance measurement data

params.name: EnableRadarTracks
params.title: 레이더트랙사용(0)
params.edescr: Only some vehicles are supported

params.name: ApplyLongDynamicCost
params.title: 차량간격유지 동적제어사용(1)
params.etitle: Using dynamic control to maintain vehicle distance (1)
params.edescr: The response speed of keeping the distance of the vehicle ahead is increased.

params.name: ApplyDynamicTFollow
params.title: 상대속도-(100%)
params.edescr: Increase the distance as they get closer

params.name: ApplyDynamicTFollowApart
params.title: 상대속도+(95%)
params.edescr: Decrease the distance as you get further away

params.name: ApplyDynamicTFollowDecel
params.title: 감속(100%)
params.edescr: Make the gap increase according to the deceleration rate

params.name: TFollowRatio
params.title: 위험:차량간격비율(100%)
params.edescr: Dangerous if less than 100%

params.name: AutoCurveSpeedCtrlUse
params.title: 커브속도(1)
params.edescr: 0: Not used, 1: Used

params.name: StopAccelApply
params.title: 정지유지브레이크-2.0x(30%)
params.edescr: Brake holding adjustment when stopping

params.name: StartAccelApply
params.title: 가속초기속도2.0x(0%)
params.edescr: Acceleration from stop->start: Not necessary to use.

params.name: InitMyDrivingMode
params.title: 드라이브모드:초기값(3)
params.edescr: 1: Fuel economy, 2: Safety, 3: Normal, 4: High speed (ignore signal), 5: Automatic

params.name: AutoNaviSpeedCtrl
params.title: 과속카메라 작동방법(2)
params.etitle: How to operate near a speed camera (2)
params.edescr: 0: Not used, 1: NDA, 2: NDA + genuine navigation

params.name: AutoNaviSpeedCtrlStart
params.title: 과속카메라감속 시작 시간(22초)
params.etitle: Speed camera deceleration start time (22 seconds)
params.edescr: Set the deceleration start point.

params.name: AutoNaviSpeedCtrlEnd
params.title: 과속카메라감속 완료 시간(6초)
params.etitle: Speed camera deceleration completion time (6 seconds)
params.edescr: Set the deceleration end point.
